body:
Most of this code is by @scheibelp however, his patches no longer work because huge changes happened to spack, this changes update some of those patches, spack still doesn't work and I plan on looking more into it, if someone could help me a little bit or the community would be appreciated.

Credit: https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/14187/files
title: [WIP] Fix Spack on Python3.8
